channel.title: Mirror's Edge - Halp!
channel.description:
Egad. I just started playing Mirror's Edge today and was going through the tutorial and got stuck almost right away. I cannot progress.
It's the part where you are supposed to do a wall jump, turn 180 degrees and then grab onto the ledge. I have tried over a hundred times to do this and fail every time.
What am I doing wrong? Is there a trick to this? Quite frustrated right now.

item.title: Mirror's Edge - Halp!
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
Okay, I was able to do it; had to change the key bindings because evidently I wasn’t able get my fingers moving fast enough otherwise.

Well, thanks for the assistance.

item.title: Mirror's Edge - Halp!
item.dc:creator: Pyroclase
item.description:
The key is Q, I believe.

Luckily, I don’t think you have to actually use that move in the game more than once or twice, though there was one section with a ton of scaffolding inside a building that I only beat because the checkpoint system glitched out.

Now, the wallrun cross-jump? THAT move will make you pull your hair out.
